title: Use a "better" dotnet-install URL
body:
**Description of Change**

Not sure if this is a sign of anything, but there is another URL

**Bugs Fixed**


```
#12 [ 7/10] RUN curl https://dot.net/v1/dotnet-install.sh -L -o dotnet-install.sh     && bash dotnet-install.sh --channel 8.0 --install-dir /usr/share/dotnet --verbose     && ln -s /usr/share/dotnet/dotnet /usr/bin/dotnet     && rm dotnet-install.sh     && dotnet help     && dotnet --info
```
